author: Hi, my name is
Konrad Malinowski
I am a
web developer
with experience in creating frontend and backend applications.
I work with technologies such as
HTML
CSS
, and
JavaScript
, using the Library -
React.
I also deal with managing servers and databases, which allows me to comprehensively support the implemented projects.
I am passionate about building intuitive and visually appealing web applications. When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and
keeping up-to-date
with the latest trends in web development.

projects: All other interesting projects can be found on my github!

projects.title: Text statistics
projects.description: A tool for analyzing text, providing statistics like character, word, and sentence counts.

projects.title: Converter
projects.description: A versatile unit converter web app supporting various measurement categories.

projects.title: Exam test
projects.description: An exam test for the INF.03 certification focused on JavaScript, jQuery, and React.

ratings.prompt: Do you want to rate this website?
ratings.content: I encourage you to click the button below and share your feedback on my work in creating this website.
